long_description: The Cannondale Utility Helmet is a fully functional, all-conditions bike helmet designed with urban commuters in mind. Tough polycarbonate shell is molded directly to the EPS foam to create a strong, single-piece helmet. Internal roll cage reinforces the helmet, helping to maintain high levels of safety while allowing ventilation. Rear retention harness is easily adjusted with a single hand; soft EVA padding doesn't absorb moisture or odors. Comfortable webbing straps with cam-lock dividers offer easy, secure adjustment for a personalized fit. Moisture-wicking pads keep sweat under control and enhance comfort. 12 vents help move air into, through and out of the helmet to keep you cool. The Cannondale Utility Helmet has a visor to block sun and weather for comfortable riding in any conditions.
